title: Coronation Street spoilers: Michelle Connor FIGHTS with Eva Price in vicious scrap which sees her drag Leanne’s sister out of the Rovers by her hair
text:
TV Magazine CORRIE CATFIGHT Coronation Street spoilers: Michelle Connor FIGHTS with Eva Price in vicious scrap which sees her drag Leanne’s sister out of the Rovers by her hair 
Michelle was left devastated after finding out husband Steve was the father of Leanne Battersby's baby Spoiler
